name: The Flesh Pit
description:
Welcome to the flesh pit.

The god of flesh demands FLESH TRIBUTE.
Slay monsters and accumulate meat!

Arrow keys move, X jumps, C attacks.
Up+C to throw items, Down+C to pick up weapons.

A game by Francis Coulombe for Ludum Dare 42!

Twitter: https://twitter.com/FrancisCoulombe
